scripts.clean: npx tsc -b --clean && npx shx rm -rf dist
scripts.serve: npx tsc -b --clean && npx shx rm -rf dist && npx orutil build && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve --mode development
scripts.serveNoModelBuild: npx tsc -b --clean && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve --mode development
